SELECT SEQ_HOT6_QUIZ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO HOT6_QUIZ(QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, QUIZ_CONTENT, QUIZ_LIST, QUIZ_LIST_TITLE, QUIZ_THEME, QUIZ_TYPE, QUIZ_ANS_ONE, USER_NUMBER) VALUES(#{quizNumber}, #{quizTitle}, #{quizContent}, #{quizList}, #{quizListTitle}, #{quizTheme}, #{quizType}, #{quizAnsOne}, #{userNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, QUIZ_CONTENT, QUIZ_LIST, QUIZ_LIST_TITLE, QUIZ_THEME, QUIZ_TYPE, TO_CHAR(QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE, TO_CHAR(QUIZ_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') QUIZ_UPDATE_DATE, QUIZ_ANS_ONE, QUIZ_ANS_TWO, QUIZ_ANS_THREE, QUIZ_ANS_FOUR, QUIZ_ANS_FIVE, USER_NUMBER FROM HOT6_QUIZ WHERE QUIZ_LIST = #{quizList} AND TO_CHAR(QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{quizRegisterDate} ORDER BY QUIZ_NUMBER

SELECT QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, QUIZ_CONTENT, QUIZ_LIST, QUIZ_LIST_TITLE, QUIZ_THEME, QUIZ_TYPE, QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE, QUIZ_UPDATE_DATE, QUIZ_ANS_ONE, QUIZ_ANS_TWO, QUIZ_ANS_THREE, QUIZ_ANS_FOUR, QUIZ_ANS_FIVE, USER_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, QUIZ_CONTENT, QUIZ_LIST, QUIZ_LIST_TITLE, QUIZ_THEME, QUIZ_TYPE, QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE, QUIZ_UPDATE_DATE, QUIZ_ANS_ONE, QUIZ_ANS_TWO, QUIZ_ANS_THREE, QUIZ_ANS_FOUR, QUIZ_ANS_FIVE, USER_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT RN, QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, QUIZ_CONTENT, QUIZ_LIST, QUIZ_LIST_TITLE, QUIZ_THEME, QUIZ_TYPE, QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE, QUIZ_UPDATE_DATE, QUIZ_ANS_ONE, QUIZ_ANS_TWO, QUIZ_ANS_THREE, QUIZ_ANS_FOUR, QUIZ_ANS_FIVE, USER_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE ORDER BY QUIZ_LIST DESC) AS RN, QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, QUIZ_CONTENT, QUIZ_LIST, QUIZ_LIST_TITLE, QUIZ_THEME, QUIZ_TYPE, QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE, QUIZ_UPDATE_DATE, QUIZ_ANS_ONE, QUIZ_ANS_TWO, QUIZ_ANS_THREE, QUIZ_ANS_FOUR, QUIZ_ANS_FIVE, USER_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, QUIZ_CONTENT, QUIZ_LIST, QUIZ_LIST_TITLE, QUIZ_THEME, QUIZ_TYPE, TO_CHAR(QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE, TO_CHAR(QUIZ_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') QUIZ_UPDATE_DATE, QUIZ_ANS_ONE, QUIZ_ANS_TWO, QUIZ_ANS_THREE, QUIZ_ANS_FOUR, QUIZ_ANS_FIVE, USER_NUMBER FROM HOT6_QUIZ Q ORDER BY QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE DESC, QUIZ_NUMBER ) D1 ) D2 WHERE RN = 1 ORDER BY QUIZ_REGISTER_DATE DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE R > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}
